<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1189834_teampu_0.HomeTeamAddressHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>HomeTeamAddressHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var HomeTeamAddressHelper = Class.create();
HomeTeamAddressHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    getHomeTeamAddress: function(homeTeamSysId) {
        var homeTeamAddress = '';
        var homeTeamGR = new GlideRecord('x_1189834_teampu_0_team'); // Replace 'u_home_team' with your actual table name
        if (homeTeamGR.get(number)) {
            homeTeamAddress = homeTeamGR.location; // Replace 'u_address' with your actual address field
        }
        return homeTeamAddress;
    },

    type: 'HomeTeamAddressHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-21 20:54:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e3de57347fe4e50bd3cb616536d4359</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HomeTeamAddressHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Community Soccer League" source="x_1189834_teampu_0">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Community Soccer League">ddfd0ef7478d4650bd3cb616536d4350</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7e3de57347fe4e50bd3cb616536d4359</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-21 21:18:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
